content: That's really helpful, thanks! I'm excited to try out these oil and cocktail pairing suggestions with my Mushroom and Truffle Risotto. Speaking of cocktails, I've been experimenting with making my own flavored syrups, like cranberry and mint, to add unique twists to my drinks. Do you have any other suggestions for flavored syrups that would pair well with gin-based cocktails, especially with earthy and herbal notes?
